fullText:
Ironclad Oath

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, githzerai, avenger, iron mind racial power
Benefit: When you use iron mind, you gain combat advantage and a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier against your oath of enmity target until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 378.
